summary: Children's multilingual learning app (Telugu, Hindi, English, Tamil) featuring alphabet matching cards, numbers, words/pictures, and Teacher/Parent login. Focused on making the UI child-friendly with vibrant colors and larger alphabet/number cards.
architectural_notes: App is a children's multilingual learning app supporting Telugu, Hindi, English, and Tamil
Includes alphabet matching cards, numbers, words/pictures sections, and Teacher/Parent login

existing_features.title: Apply a bright, vibrant, child-friendly color scheme throughout the entire app. Use bold, saturated colors for backgrounds, buttons, cards, navigation, and interactive elements. Replace any muted or adult-oriented palette with playful, high-contrast colors that are visually engaging for young children. Ensure the theme is consistent across all pages including Home, AlphabetLesson, NumbersLesson, Numbers100Lesson, MiniGame, MatchingGame, Quiz, VocabularyLesson, PoemsLesson, PuzzleGame, TimedChallenge, and all other pages.

Increase the display size of alphabet letters and number digits across all relevant pages. In AlphabetLesson.tsx, significantly increase the font size of the letter displayed on each card. In NumbersLesson.tsx and Numbers100Lesson.tsx, significantly increase the font size of the number on each card. Cards themselves should also be larger and more tappable. The enlarged size should make letters and numbers immediately readable and prominent for young children.

new_feature_requests.summary: Apply bright, child-friendly colors throughout the app
Increase the size of alphabet and number cards/fonts for easier readability
